events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the senior software engineer position and have stored all their submitted documents successfully.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department based on the candidate's software development experience and skills.
A dedicated recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process efficiently.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, and the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software architecture and development.
The candidate has responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the next steps and confirms availability for the technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for June 10th at 14:00 UTC with the engineering panel to assess in-depth software and system design skills.
